title: Sans serif
content:
I know this is probably an easy one but...

What typeface is this shirt set in?  
 [http://www.turnnocturnal.com/product/huge-type-looks-sweet](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020063256/http:/www.turnnocturnal.com/product/huge-type-looks-sweet "http://www.turnnocturnal.com/product/huge-type-looks-sweet")

author: Bloom.Aar

comments.content:
Huge type looks sweet.  
Sadly not in this case.
